name: Lily's Town
summary:
Welcome to the Town where every flavor tells a story

Try yourself as a cafe owner in a small town: pick perfect ingredients, prepare and serve meals and make your clients happy!

You have got a cafe, which is yet to become known. Win the sympathy of your neighbors, serving delicious dishes - success is not far off.

Do not stop at one place! Many different cafes are waiting for you: ramen, pizza, waffles... Who knows what comes next?

No client leaves unhappy. Demonstrate your cooking and management skills at Lily's Town!

Engage in a fascinating selection of the best ingredients, solving a puzzle. Cook in a relaxing atmosphere, learning more and more of the locals.
